tool_description: gives users response as hot topics of the e-sports community from past 6 hours
name: Esport Trends
title: Esport Trends

api_list.name: Get latest
api_list.description: returns the user all the hot topics from past 6 hours
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-trends.p.rapidapi.com/fetch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-trends.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
